history.proof: intros p0 p1 n Hpl0 Hpl1. sauto l: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros p0 p1 n Hpl0 Hpl1.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce pl_tl_length to an evaluable reference.

original: intros p0 p1 n Hpl0 Hpl1. unfold pl_tl_length in Hpl0, Hpl1. intros. induction H. - inversion H0; subst. unfold pl_compat. left; split; reflexivity. - inversion H1; subst. unfold pl_compat. right; split; discriminate. - inversion H2; subst. eapply IHHpl_tl_length; eauto.
